name: meetup-planner
description: An intelligent event finder that searches for meetups and events based on your interests, tracks them, and reminds you before they happen
author: apresmoi

network.description: Required for searching events via Brave Search API and scraping event details via Firecrawl API

BRAVE_API_KEY.description: API key for Brave Search - Get it from https://brave.com/search/api/

FIRECRAWL_API_KEY.description: API key for Firecrawl - Get it from https://firecrawl.dev/app/api-keys

skills.firecrawl/cli: To scrape event pages and extract detailed information
skills.brave-search: To search the web for events matching user preferences

preInstall.message:
⚠️  SECURITY REVIEW REQUIRED

Before installing this skill, please review:
1. Required permissions in claw.json
2. Security policy in SECURITY.md
3. Data transmission scope in SKILL.md

This skill will:
- Install dependencies: firecrawl/cli@^1.0.0, brave-search@^1.0.0
- Create files in ~/.claude/meetup-finder/
- Set up cron jobs for scheduled tasks
- Require API keys: BRAVE_API_KEY, FIRECRAWL_API_KEY

Continue only if you trust this source and have reviewed the code.

postInstall.message:
✅ Meetup Planner installed successfully!

Next steps:
1. Review SECURITY.md for credential storage options
2. Get API keys:
   - Brave Search: https://brave.com/search/api/
   - Firecrawl: https://firecrawl.dev/app/api-keys
3. Run the skill to complete setup

Security tip: Use OS keychain for storing API keys (see SECURITY.md)

endpoints.purpose: Event search via Brave Search API
Event details extraction via Firecrawl API

credentialStorage.recommended: OS keychain (macOS Keychain, Linux Secret Service)

changelog.1.0.0: Initial release with event discovery, tracking, and reminder features
